choices: Head to the community gym, evening is still young!
1.content:
Katy was investigating the scene of the crime. Simple shop theft. Thieves or thief took most of the valuable items. The store was a simple store, nothing too fancy except for the fact it sold mystic and spiritual items. These things probably were valuable to collectors. Katy eyed around the store to scan for more evidence. She sighed.

*tap*

Katy darted upwards from her crouched position as she was tapped on the shoulder. It was the shopkeeper and owner of the store who had tapped her shoulder. A greyed hair man in his late 40s probably. He wore scruffy looking brown beanie and had a worn brown apron over his casual attire underneath. The man's name was William.

"Detective, anything found?" William inquired.

"I'm afraid not." Katy replied.

"Seems the person or people who robbed you were adequately skilled and that they didn't leave much to go on with, rest assured I'm sure we will catch them soon enough." Katy continued.

"Hmmm, ah well, I'm sure you and your colleagues are working your hardest." William said.

"...Here detective, a little something as thanks for your effort and possibly to bring you good fortune in the events to come." William said as he offered something.

In his hand was a necklace. Rather simple yet elegant. Silver chained and had a small pendant with a deep red gem in the form of a circle.

"Thank you, I will keep in touch if any further developments come up." Katy thanked William.

Katy left the scene and headed back to her apartment.

Now what should she do.
1.title: The night of the incident

11.content:
Katy decided that some sleep would be nice. Its been a long hard day with investigating the theft and all. She also had the feeling that early sleep like this would be rare in the upcoming weeks as she had a hunch alot of events would happen. Katy changed into her night attire and slept. As she slept, the necklace glowed faintly under the moonlight that shone through the blinds.

"Life...Expectancy...milk...birth...joy...Mother..." Thoughts formed as if someone was communicating with her.

Katy awoke with a start as she felt a pain in her midriff area. Her belly was full of activity as her quadruplets was active this late...She looked over behind her to see Daniel her lover asleep as he turns over to slowly wake. He smiles at her and squeezes her a little giving her a hug before rubbing her exposed pregnant globe. Katy smiles softly then...-BZZZZZRRTT-

Katy awoke. She looked down on her midriff area, flat. She heaved a sigh of relief. Then Katy noticed the vibration was coming from her phone. She went over to see who was calling. It was...
11.title: Its been a long day...

choices: Back home, gotta figure this out.
12.content:
Katy decided that it was still quite early to go to bed. She looked at her digital watch and saw it was still 8pm which meant that the gym was still open. The community gym wasn't anything fancy but it had decent equipment and the best part was it was across the street from where Katy lived. Katy got inside and headed for the changing area. She changed out of her jeans and black top into her gym attire. She admired her figure for a bit. Her figure was average but the young cops back at the office were always staring as she walked past their desks. She could see why her form fitting clothes always showed off her moderate chest which were C cups and her butt was always round looking, she giggled a little to herself before leaving the changing area. Inside the workout area she decided to run the treadmill a little. Its important to work on stamina when you have to chase criminals. She did this for about 45 minutes.

During all of this, the area was pretty sparse except for Katy, a middle aged man and a pregnant young woman. As Katy was running on the treadmill, the woman approached her.

"erm...E-excuse me miss." The woman spoke.

Katy raised an eyebrow.

"Yes?" Katy responded.

"Would you happen to know where the Everhill Hotel is?" She asked.

Katy then pointed out the directions to the young pregnant woman. As Katy spoke she thought of how she wished to feel how that pregnant belly felt like. As she thought of it whilst giving directions *flash*. Katy then found her pacing slowing considerably and that her chest jiggled alot more and she was leaning forward a bit more than normal. She looked down and found a pregnant belly in place of her flat belly. She was surprised.

"M-miss...are you ok?" The once pregnant woman spoke.

"Uh...y-yeah...probably should stop now that the little one is kicking...heh" Katy said as she forced a smile.

The woman thanked for the instructions and complimented Katy on still exercising when shes so far along. Katy went into the changing room and changed into her jeans which now were stretched quite far out and her top was no longer form fitting to say the least. Katy looked at her watch and saw it was 8:50PM.
12.title: Work out time!

123.content:
Katy waddled awkwardly to a bench outside her apartment building. She found it a little difficult to walk with the new load and her centre of gravity shifted so she has to adjust to the new addition for now. Katy sat on the bench and pulled out her phone from her pocket. Katy looked through the contacts and found Daniel. Daniel Myers or Dan as Katy called him was a senior officer and lover of Katy the two were from the same neighbourhood and were childhood friends and now lovers. Daniel often worked with Katy in the office and usually took her out for lunch.

Katy waited patiently for Dan to answer the call. She could only think of some way to explain this and is worried at how he will take it.

"Hello?" Katy asked.

"Katy! How you doing baby girl?" Daniel answered cheerfully.

"Um...y-yeah fine, Dan you know I'm...I'm pregnant...." Katy confessed reluctantly.

"..Uh yeah, Katy don't you remember that we're engaged now and that we told our parents the news about 7 months ago?" Dan told Katy.

"....o-Oh yeah! I kinda forgot for a moment..." Katy said as she realised what happened.

"Uh...Dan...could you come over tonight...I'm..I need someone to cling to..." Katy asked Dan.

"Sure Katy...I'll be over for the night see you." Dan answered.

Katy hung the call. Katy went up to her apartment and changed into her night attire. Katy sat on her bed and started to think about the situation.

"Ok...so I'm pregnant...everyone around me seem to think that I have always been pregnant and now my relation with Dan is even closer." Katy began.

"It seems that the lady back at the gym should have been the one with this child but now I have it..." Katy continued.

"All is well Mistress Katy." A voice spoke inside her head.

"WHAT? HOW? WHO?" Katy shouted in her head, confused.

"Calm down mistress, I am Eve a spirit maiden." Eve spoke.

"Ok...Eve now whats going on with this please explain." Katy asked pleadingly.

"All is fine mistress, the little ones inside you are temporary and you may return them if you wish to or send them to a new suitable host." Eve spoke.

"As long as the necklace is on you, I will be able to maintain your pregnancy indefinitely till you wish to send the little ones away or back, rest assured everyone around you will think this is all natural." Eve continued.

"Ok...well thats good to know...though it would be great if you could make them weight less" Katy thought as she pointed at her belly and breasts.

"Well that is beyond my capabilities I'm afraid." Eve said with a chuckle.

*Ding* *Dong*

"Sugar you in?" Daniel sounded.

"Y-yeah! Let yourself in." Katy answered.

Dan came into the apartment. He looked happy. Dan came over to hug Katy and kissed her on her forehead.

"Whats the issue Katy?" Dan asked.

"I'm just feeling a little under the weather but I'm fine now that you're around." Katy said with a smile.

The two head onto the large bed in Katy's room. The rest of the night was playful cuddles and a little love as the night turned to dawn. Katy awoke and...
123.title: Enter Daniel.

1231.content:
"Spirit maiden?" Katy asks in her head.

"Yes Mistress Starlight, I serve you and will respond to your calls." Eve responds.

"Eve, I have a question, how many babies can I carry?" Katy asks.

"In theory, an unlimited amount however you are limited to your bodies capabilities so a good estimate would be 6 or 7 for now." Eve answers.

"Ok, then can the necklace return partial amounts of children back?" Katy asks.

"Yes mistress but why would you want that mistress?" Eve asks with a slight cheerful chuckle.

Katy smiles and rubs her belly even more.

"Very well, I will call you out Eve to chat next time but for now you can return." Katy says.

Katy heads out of her apartment. Katy makes her way into her car and drives to the station.

In the office, Katy is in her office which has a sign that read 'D.Katy Starlight'. Katy was busy filing in her reports on the robbery and then hears a *knock* on her door...
1231.title: The office.

12311.content:
Katy looked up and saw that it was Jennifer who knocked and entered. Jennifer was a slim but quite curvy partner of Katy. They were both best friends since young. Jennifer wore a dark maroon jacket and a dark purple top inside along with a dark maroon jeans. Jennifer was about the same height as Katy. Jennifer was athletic and had a passion for volleyball. Jennifer also has quite an impressive rack that were ranging from the bigger D cups. Jennifer came into Katy's office and chatted.

"Morning Katy, the little one kept you up?" Jennifer asks cheerfully.

"Naw, his good." Katy said as she pats her belly.

Katy then decides to use the bathroom. Katy waddles past several other offices and finds the toilet at the end of the corridor. Usually no one will use this one as it was far from the main offices and rooms. Once inside, Katy went inside a stall. Once in the stall Katy begins to call Eve out.

"Eve?" Katy calls.

"Yes mistress?" Eve responds.

"What is the purpose of getting 'pregnant'?" Katy asks.

"Well for your case, the more babies you hold, the stronger your abilities are." Eve reponds.

"Abilities?" Katy asks.

"Protection from physical items,foresight and more however you tire out alot if you use abilities frequently. Eve answers.

"Alright thanks for the info Eve." Katy says.

Katy gets up and goes out of the bathroom. She once again slowly waddle past some officers who just congratulate her and compliment her. Katy thinks 'Looks like the necklace really does twist other's minds.'. She found her way back to her office where Jennifer waited.

"Sorry Jennifer, you know with all the things I've been having lately..." Katy begins.

"It's alright Katy, I understand but we do have a job and I got something to show you." Jennifer says.

"Alright, well I got a few suspects for the mystic shop robbery." Jennifer says.

"Mhm, you got their pictures and info in your office?" Katy asks.

Jennifer nods. Jennifer and Katy then exit Katy's office and they went down the corridor past the water cooler where Katy stopped to get a cup of water before catching up with Jennifer. Inside Jennifer's office, Jennifer pulls out two suspect files.

"The first guy's name is Jack and he was imprisoned once a year ago for robbing several antique stores, mystic stuff and all those knick knack items." Jennifer says.

"Then there's this lady called Mei Li and she's been seen around the area on CCTV around the robbery site days before." Jennifer says.

The two files lay opened. Katy sees their profile pictures, Jack has an average Joe like face while Mei Li has a soft, Japanese-like face.

"So, Katy which one of them should we investigate first?" Jennifer asks.
12311.title: Two leads...

choices: No let her pass out if she has to.
123112.content:
"Mei Li seems to have the location and seems about right." Katy spoke.

The duo then went out of the station and Jennifer suggested maybe they should grab lunch first as it was nearing 12pm. Katy agreed as her babies were getting hungry. They headed out to a noodle store and Katy ordered three take out meals while Jennifer had one. Katy craved for chinese food today and was more than happy to have a few meals of it.

"Wow, Katy seems you and the little one were hungry eh." Jennifer teased Katy.

Katy smiled and did not reply as she was busy enjoying the noodles which were just a wonder for her at this point. After finishing up, Katy and Jennifer then headed for Jennifer's patrol car which Katy go into the passenger seat while Jennifer drove. Katy had to readjust the seat but she could fit. The two drove out and headed for 263 Elmwood.

Katy and Jennifer headed for 263 Elmwood which is the location where Mei Li is supposed to be staying at. The drive was quite a long one, a good 4 hours as it was discreetly outside of the city and in the outskirts. Katy sat in the passenger seat of the police car while Jennifer drove. Time ticked by and by the time they arrived it was already 4 pm. Katy stepped out and took a look around. The place seemed quite empty. In front of Katy was an old apartment building. There seemed to be no one around then Katy saw a lady dressed in a tight fitting kimono came out. The lady saw the police tag resting on Katy's belly and she ran. Jennifer decides to cut her off by running in another way while Katy keeps her going to where Jennifer wants her to be.

Katy's hugely distended belly was slowing her down and Katy thinks maybe she could turn the tables and *Flash* Katy's belly was flat and her rack back to C cups but she looked up and sees the Kimono of the lady burst open as a largely protruding belly surged out and the kimono tighten around the chest as the runner's rack swells. Katy easily pins the now heavily pregnant lady. Jennifer comes in from behind an alley and is happy to see the lady pinned.

"Not so fast when your heavily with child eh?" Jennifer says.

"Tell us why you ran Mei Li!" Katy spoke with power.

"I...ugh..argh...-" Mei Li tried to speak as her contractions kicks in.

Jennifer lets the heavily pregnant Mei Li sit while Katy decides what to do...

If she takes the pregnancy back, Mei Li might escape but if she doesn't Mei Li might pass out....
123112.title: The Japanese lady.

choices: Call it a day for now.
1231121.content:
Katy decides that a person like Mei would most likely die if she doesn't take back all the babies in her. *Flash* Katy's flat belly explodes out once more as her loosely fitted jacket and top stretched to their limits. Katy's breasts expanded with such sudden might that her bra actually almost snaps. Meanwhile, Mei was able to stand up and bolted off. Katy then doubled over as she felt her new load kicking.

"Katy! Are you ok?" Jennifer asks.

"I'm...I'm fine, Mei though?" Katy speaks while recovering from the strong kick of her unborn load.

"She got away, I did find this though..."Jennifer says.

Jennifer shows a sticker on a note. It had a pregnant belly silhouette symbol and some writing that reads: 19th st 32.
1231121.title: The good cop.

choices: Ask about her opinion on becoming a mother.
13.content:
Katy decided that the local library might be a good place to visit and she knows librarian there since she was a college friend. Katy gets in her car and drives into town and stops outside the library. The library was not huge but it definitely was one of the bigger buildings in this area of town. Katy enters the double doors and sees a figure carrying two stacks of books. Katy notices that the person was struggling and looks like their about to trip so she rushes over to help them. As Katy helps the figure who she recognises as Lydia, the librarian and a friend of Katy. Katy helps Lydia take a stack of books so she won't be so imbalanced. As Katy takes the heavy stack, she notices that Lydia was pregnant and heavily looking too.

"Sorry, thanks for helping me...Oh Katy, nice to see you!" Lydia begins.

"Yeah, no problem Lydia, looks like you're expecting." Katy begins.

"Y-yeah twins even..." Lydia begins.

A thought pops in Katy's mind where she was pregnant with twins and *Flash*. Katy suddenly stumbles a little as she notices her C cups swell into D cups and belly surges out to the size that Lydia's was and Lydia's shrunk.

"Wow twins huh Katy, you ok?" Lydia asks.

"u-Uh yeah, they just kicked is all." Katy answers.

As the two head to the main table in the middle of the library, Katy puts her stack down and takes a seat. Lydia begins to arrange the books onto nearby shelves. ' What on earth is going on?!' Katy thinks. 'Mistress, calm down.' a voice answers. 'Who is this in my head?!' Katy asks. 'I am Eve, your spirit maiden, I reside in the necklace you are wearing.' Eve spoke. 'Why am I pregnant Eve?' Katy asks. 'Mistress thought of it and I took Lydia's pregnancy and made it yours, not to worry you shall not give birth to them as long as I am on you.' Eve answers 'The pregnancies are used to activate the more powerful powers of this necklace and you may use the pregnancy itself to encumber other females or grant pregnancies to otherwise infertile women.' Eve explains.

As Katy sits, Lydia then approaches her.

"All ok there Katy?" Lydia asks.

"Y-yeah, just tired....Hey Lydia do you...." Katy begins.
13.title: Hitting the books.

info.brief_description: You managed to find a necklace that allows the user to take pregnancies and control them.
info.description:
How the Necklace works
The necklace is able to transfer a pregnancy to a suitable female host (the user). It can only transfer pregnancies from another pregnant woman so if the targeted woman has triplets the transfer will take the triplets into the host.

All pregnancies accelerated till they are of full term. Only the host will know of this and everyone else will just think she was pregnant from the start.

The necklace will stop birth as long as it is worn. If the necklace is taken off forcibly or by accident, the first 3 hours will be mild cramps then after will be contractions and ultimately the water bag breaking. The host will have 9 hours in total to find the necklace but the necklace's magic make it seem that the host is oblivious to the missing necklace until contractions hit.

The necklace can either return the pregnancies or sent all the carried babies to another woman so she will give birth to babies and she will be their mother.

The necklace has no limit to how many pregnancies it can take but the limit is how much the user can handle and it can only work on either the host or others females around.

While the user has some babies, the necklace is able to use a secondary functions like time stopping and enhanced protection from physical objects through a shield. The only downside is that you'll be exhausted after using the extra abilities.

How does birth work for the main character works
Our main character will have 9 hours to put on the necklace as stated above and during this hours cramps, contractions and the water bag breaking. If she manages to put on the necklace birth is avoided but if she doesn't her water bag breaks but the pregnancies will all return to their original mothers and the main character will awake at home with the necklace but with no pregnancy by magic.

How the necklace guides the main character
In the first few beginning chapters, the necklace's spirit is unknown and guides through thought and later on may be called out either by will or forced to by certain events. The main character usually is forced to take a pregnancy as the spirit inside the necklace overpowers her to do so.

How will others react to the pregnancy
The necklace will make it seemed that the main character was naturally pregnant and that they will seem to know as if she was like that the whole time. No one will truly point out how she got pregnant since the main character usually is only temporarily having the pregnancy and will transfer it out eventually... The necklace's magic will haze other's minds to purposely avoid asking whys and hows as it replaces them with regular general observations.

How the main character reacts to pregnancy
Katy will at first be surprised but her secret want to be pregnant and use it on others will develop as we go along. Whether or not Katy uses it with compassion is up to readers.

Setting
The story is set in a time that is modern. Your character's name is Katy Starlight and you have moved out of your little hometown and settled into the new city of Unity City. You have a job as a detective to investigate many murders and so on. You gain the necklace from a crime scene in a mystic shop and the shopkeeper insisted that you keep it. So you did. Unknown to you that the power it grants and the even more powerful it holds once you had a pregnancy kept.

Rules
1. No Mpreg
2. No other inflations but pregnancy
3. First person is appreciated but you can write in third person here and there
4. Expand the plot with each addition
5. No sudden massive expansion ie over 20 babies (be logical)

I'll add on here and there when I can.

Enjoy
